This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: I was sitting outside on my porch and I went to look in the direction of the sun when I noticed the object
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting outside on my porch and I went to look in the direction of the sun when I noticed a black object fluttering around the sky. Since it was close to the sun it was a little hard to focus but I did see something. The object moved up and down then in a right to left motion, not in a straight line, but what appeared to be a little wavy. It definetly was not an aircraft because it did not go in any flight pattern. I went inside to get my digital camera and took several pics of the object. I could not see the object because of the glare from the sun, but I took pics anyway. I looked at the pics and could not see anything, I thought maybe whatever it was left by the time I was finished taking pics. I was about to delete them when I noticed in pic called "SUN#4" a black object in the lower left corner of the pic.I will send all four pics, but definetly in #4 you can see something.
